sentences.en: A system composed of two or more phases is heterogeneous.
sentences.cn: 由两相或更多的相组成的体系称为复相体系.

sentences.en: Continuous nucleation model is applied to describe heterogeneous nucleation in liquid metal.
sentences.cn: 采用连续形核模型来描述液相中的自发形核.

sentences.en: Depressive disorders are a heterogeneous group of conditions that share the common symptom of dysphoric mood.
sentences.cn: 抑郁性疾患包括一组具有心情忧郁这一共同症状的若干情况.

sentences.en: He believes that this equation connot be applied to heterogeneous flow.
sentences.cn: 他认为该式不能应用到非均质流型.

sentences.en: Heterogeneous bridging groups can raise the glass temperature according to their chemical composition.
sentences.cn: 不同类桥联基团根据它们的化学组成能提高玻璃化温度.

sentences.en: In heterogeneous anisotropic materials the heat flow vector and conductivity are more complex.
sentences.cn: 在各向异性的非均质材料中,热流向量和热导率很复杂.

sentences.en: Many processes that are essential to the chemical industry use heterogeneous catalysts.
sentences.cn: 很多重要的化学工业过程就是使用多相催化剂的.

sentences.en: Microscopic examination of this sludge reveals that it is formed by a heterogeneous population of microorgenisms.
sentences.cn: 微观检验这些污泥,发现它们是由异质微生物群体所构成的.

sentences.en: Perforated plates correspond to heterogeneous media.
sentences.cn: 多孔板相当于均匀介质.

sentences.en: She looked about at the heterogeneous chairs and tables.
sentences.cn: 她瞅了一眼那形形色色的桌椅.

sentences.en: The albumins contain the majority of the cellular enzymes and are thus extremely heterogeneous.
sentences.cn: 清蛋白包含细胞的酶的大多数,因而是极其不均匀的.

sentences.en: The heterogeneous catalyst first attracts the salt to its surface and holds it there.
sentences.cn: 多相催化剂先将盐吸附在它的表面并使它固定在那里.

sentences.en: The market is generally heterogeneous in what it expects from the banking community.
sentences.cn: 市场对银行界的期望不同.

sentences.en: The standards of Web Service solved interoperability puzzles among heterogeneous information systems.
sentences.cn: Web服务标准的出现有效地解决了异构信息系统之间的互操作问题.

sentences.en: There is a heterogeneous mass of papers in the teacher's office.
sentences.cn: 老师的办公室里堆满了大批不同的论文。

words.tran_cn: 异质的；[生物] 异源的；异种的
不同的；不齐的；不等的；异种的
[生物] 异质性；[化学] 不均匀性；[化学] 多相性
多相的；[生物]异种的；[物][化学]不均匀的；由不同成分形成的

phrases.tran_cn: 非均相催化剂；多相催化；不匀触媒
非均质物质；不均匀材料
非均匀系；复相系；非均质系

trans.tran_cn: 各种各样的，成分混杂的
trans.tran_en: consisting of parts or members that are very different from each other
